name: photoview
description: Photoview is a simple and fast self-hosted photo gallery for personal use. It includes automatic scanning, albums, tag browsing, and supports WebDAV and mobile-friendly interfaces.
features: Automatic scanning: Continuously monitor directories for new photos and automatically index them.
Album organization: Create and manage albums with drag-and-drop photo organization.
Tag browsing: Filter and search photos using EXIF tags, keywords, and custom metadata.
WebDAV support: Access your photo library through WebDAV for integration with file managers and apps.
Mobile-friendly: Responsive design optimized for browsing photos on smartphones and tablets.
Multi-user support: Create separate accounts with individual libraries and sharing permissions.
Thumbnail generation: Automatically create optimized thumbnails for fast loading and browsing.
Slideshow mode: View photos in fullscreen slideshow with configurable timing and transitions.
EXIF data display: View camera settings, location, and technical details for each photo.
Sharing links: Generate public or password-protected links to share albums with others.
Fast performance: Optimized database queries and caching ensure quick loading even with large libraries.
Video playback: Play video files directly in the browser with HTML5 video player support.
